import { useState } from "react"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; function CreateScript() { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [script, setScript] = useState({}); // Update contact state on input change const inputChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setScript({ ...script, [name]: value, }); }; // Add contact const onSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); try { const response = await fetch( "http://localhost:8000/add-contact/", { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" }, body: JSON.stringify(contact) } ); navigate("/"); } catch (error) { console.error(error.message); } }; return (
); } export default CreateScript;
